Title: Music Effect
Text: Music has a powerful effect on our emotions. It can make us feel happy, sad, or even angry. Many people listen to music to help them _1_ after a long day at work. Research suggests that listening to classical music can actually improve your concentration and help you study _2_. However, loud music can have a _3_ impact on your hearing if you listen to it through headphones for too long. Ideally, you should keep the volume at a _4_ level.

Title: Coffee Time
Text: Coffee is one of the most popular beverages in the world. For many, the day cannot start without a strong cup of coffee to _1_ them up. The caffeine in coffee acts as a stimulant, which keeps you _2_ and focused. However, drinking too much can lead to anxiety and sleeplessness, so it is important to drink it in _3_.
